typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		description as string,
		key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_agreement_type.parquet']) ~> PreDimAgreementType
PreDimAgreementType derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_desc = 'All Agreement Types') ~> AddConstant
AddConstant sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_agreement_type.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimAgreementTypeUpdates
